title: Samsung Galaxy A73 quietly launched without much fanfare
content:
Last week, Samsung officially unveiled the Galaxy A53 and Galaxy A33, the newest mid-range offerings in the company’s A-series portfolio. Alongside these phones, the South Korean also launched a third, more powerful device that flew under our radar: Galaxy A73. The Galaxy A73 gets a single line mention in Samsung’s press release, so it’s no

The post Samsung Galaxy A73 quietly launched without much fanfare appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Galaxy A73 is official, offeirng a 6.7-inch AMOLED 120Hz display, a 108MP primary camera and a 5,000mAh battery. Read on.
